create_call.description: Creates a new call in the call log in MyCase

props.name: called_at
props.description: When the call happened

props.name: caller_phone_number
props.description: The caller\

props.name: call_for
props.description: The staff member this call is associated with

props.name: message
props.description: A description of the call

props.name: caller_type
props.description: Choose how to identify the caller

props.name: caller_name
props.description: The caller\

props.name: client
props.description: The existing client

props.name: lead
props.description: The existing lead

props.name: call_type
props.description: Type of call

props.name: resolved
props.description: Should this call show as resolved?

create_case_stage.description: Creates a new case stage in MyCase

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the case stage

create_case.description: Creates a new case in MyCase

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the case (must be unique)

props.name: case_number
props.description: An identifier for this case (recommended to be unique)

props.name: opened_date
props.description: The date the case was created/opened (ISO-8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: case_stage
props.description: The stage the case is currently in (must match MyCase system)

props.name: practice_area
props.description: The practice area for this case (must match MyCase system)

props.name: description
props.description: A description for the case

props.name: sol_date
props.description: The statute of limitations date (ISO-8601 date format: YYYY-MM-DD)

props.name: status
props.description: The status of the case

props.name: outstanding_balance
props.description: The outstanding balance of this case

props.name: billing_contact_id
props.description: The ID of the client or company to assign as the billing contact

props.name: client_ids
props.description: Comma-separated list of client IDs to associate with the case

props.name: company_ids
props.description: Comma-separated list of company IDs to associate with the case

props.name: staff_id
props.description: ID of staff member to associate with the case

props.name: lead_lawyer
props.description: Is the staff member the lead lawyer for this case?

props.name: originating_lawyer
props.description: Is the staff member the originating lawyer for this case?

create_company.description: Creates a new company in MyCase

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the company

props.name: email
props.description: Company email address

props.name: website
props.description: Company website URL

props.name: main_phone_number
props.description: Main phone number for the company

props.name: fax_phone_number
props.description: Fax phone number for the company

props.name: address1
props.description: Street address line 1

props.name: address2
props.description: Street address line 2

props.name: city
props.description: City

props.name: state
props.description: State

props.name: zip_code
props.description: ZIP/Postal code

props.name: country
props.description: Country

props.name: notes
props.description: Additional information about the company (visible to firm members only)

props.name: cases
props.description: Cases to associate with the company

props.name: clients
props.description: Clients to associate with the company

create_custom_field.description: Creates a new custom field in MyCase

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the custom field

props.name: parent_type
props.description: The parent resource type of the custom field

props.name: field_type
props.description: The field type of the custom field

props.name: list_options
props.description: List of options for the custom field (required if field type is "list")

props.name: option
props.description: The name of the list option

create_document.description: Creates a new document in MyCase

props.name: document_type
props.description: Choose whether to create a firm document or associate it with a specific case

props.name: case
props.description: Select the case to associate this document with

props.name: path
props.description: The relative path including document name (e.g., folder1/folder2/document_name). Folders will be created automatically.

props.name: filename
props.description: The filename of the physical file including extension (e.g., file.pdf)

props.name: description
props.description: The description of this document

props.name: assigned_date
props.description: The assigned date of this document

props.name: staff
props.description: Staff members to share this document with (only for firm documents)

create_event.description: Creates a new event in MyCase

props.name: name
props.description: The name of this event

props.name: start
props.description: The start date and time of this event

props.name: end
props.description: The end date and time of this event

props.name: staff
props.description: Staff members to associate with this event

props.name: required_staff
props.description: Staff members who are required to attend (all others are optional)

props.name: description
props.description: Event description

props.name: all_day
props.description: Is this an all day event?

props.name: private
props.description: Is this a private event?

props.name: location
props.description: The location associated with this event

props.name: case
props.description: The case associated with this event

props.description: The activity name for this expense (will be created if it doesn\

props.name: entry_date
props.description: The entry date of this expense

props.name: cost
props.description: Cost of the expense

props.name: units
props.description: Number of units

props.name: billable

props.name: description
props.description: Description of the expense

props.name: staff
props.description: The staff member associated with this expense

props.description: Clients to associate with the case (used only when creating)

props.description: Companies to associate with the case (used only when creating)

make_request.description: Makes a raw HTTP request to the MyCase API

props.name: method
props.description: HTTP method to use

props.name: path
props.description: API endpoint path (e.g., /cases or /clients/123)

props.name: query_params
props.description: Query parameters as JSON object

props.name: body
props.description: Request body as JSON (for POST, PUT, PATCH)

props.name: headers
props.description: Additional headers as JSON object
